title: How Much Does an Olympic Bike Cost? A Rundown of Bikes from Canyon, Specialized, Cervelo, and More
content:
How much does an Olympic bike cost? Less than you'd think, as long as you're not racing it.

Read the full article at How Much Does an Olympic Bike Cost? A Rundown of Bikes from Canyon, Specialized, Cervelo, and More on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
